extendedInfo.description: SuperLivePro is a professional mobile phone client software for digital video recorders and IP cameras in CCTV surveillance (compatible models only).The software is for professional usage and copyright protected.---------------------UPDATE-----------------------------------------2013-05-20------------1.Fix the bug:click "setting" button,the program is crash.2.Fix the bug:click "play favorite channel" button,the program is crash.3.Fix the bug:Some mobile phone display incomplete interface---------------------NOTICE-----------------------------If an exception occurs after updating the software, uninstall and then reinstall the software_________________________________________________________________

reviews.title: Rectify update problem
reviews.comment: It was working fine but after updating cannot open app. Popup error message, please solve this as soon as possible.
reviews.author: Willis Thong

reviews.title: Update failure
reviews.comment: Screen resolution is jacked up after latest update. Bottom of screen is shifted down out of view. Hard to explain, but the app is almost unusable now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worse application
reviews.comment: I am not able to hear haf of te  time spckers it freezes and some time I am not able to open also now I have iPhone also it works flowless in apple but not hear need to do lots of fixing thsnks.
reviews.author: Gaurang Patel

reviews.title: Crashes since last update
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this installed for over a year on droid-x.   Now it crashes all the time without starting.
reviews.author: John Calatayud

reviews.title: Much more improved
reviews.comment: My previous score was only two stars. Now I give four because the app has gotten muuuuch better. The only complain is that there isn\'t an option to export/import the list of DVRs. That\'s crucial for those who install DVRs and need to restore all of them on their phones in case they change them (phones).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Judging by the grammar...
reviews.comment: Can we really expect a smooth working product by this guy? I\'m going to say No. Shame on Qsee for not making an app that works and having to resort to this sorry excuse for a substitute.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: after upgrade doesn\'t work properly
reviews.comment: pls fix asap. It was working fine on s2 until the last upgrade. Now screen is biased down not allowing to use tools. Picture is streched and all cameras view is not wrking
reviews.author: Rostislav Shternberg

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is one of the best apps to monitoring your security camera\'s with your smartphone, no major issues works very smoothly will recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks!!!!!
reviews.comment: Thank you for finally fixing for the droid bionic!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not work after up date
reviews.comment: Screen resolution is jacked up after latest up date.bottom of screen is shffed down out of view.please solve this as soon as possible
reviews.author: manish verma

reviews.title: Watching anytime everywhere
reviews.comment: I have been using this app to watch my full HD cameras and DVR from Acegear and it works very well over 3G/4G and wi-fi. This app give me peace of mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid Razr Maxx
reviews.comment: Finally the developer has fixed the app and it now works on my Droid Razr Maxx. Thank you. Finally!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps shutting down
reviews.comment: Error message continues to pop up. Please fix
reviews.author: Shan J

reviews.title: Disappointment
reviews.comment: Previous version perfectly working for me. This update not working, when try to open the application its always shows \'unfortunately super live pro has stopped\'.Pls fix this issue ASAP.
reviews.author: Mohamed Sirajudeen

reviews.title: No good at all
reviews.comment: App crashes everytime I  try to use. Error message every day!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: update failed
reviews.comment: After update to this latest version, the screen resolution is not fix to my galaxy S3 mini, after login to live view function, the button at the bottom is not show on scree...
reviews.author: Steve Lek

reviews.title: Update ruined the app
reviews.comment: This app worked well until the recent update.  Now it just sits and spins.  Restarting my pho.e, reinstalling..makes no difference.  It is completely unusable now.
reviews.author: Donna Hodgkins

reviews.title: Display problems on my Note I
reviews.comment: Previous version still quite usable except for  some selection bugs (not able to display whole words) .  I wish the updated version fixed this problem, however after updated, the apps only use the top left half of the screen (use only 1/4 of the screen) also fonts is too big to make any changes,please fix as soon as possible!
reviews.author: Kar Chan

reviews.title: A poor app
reviews.comment: Can no longer select from the camera list. App does not display properly on my screen anymore. I waited long enough for a fix. Ill find another app
reviews.author: delta2support

reviews.title: Update screw up
reviews.comment: I have used this app and loved it until the most recent update. After the app recently updated everything is out of whack. The screen has shifted and the video is now fuzzy. Please undo the most recent update as the app was great beforehand. Now the app is pretty much unusable and useless!
reviews.author: Mel W
